title: A Christmas Gift For You from Shankly 2008
description:
A Christmas Gift For You from Shankly 2008. 96 Christmas gems to get you in the mood from Shankly. All songs are 2008 except for the final CD which are alternative greats that did not feature on last years Christmas gift. If you missed that, you can still find it here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3926029/Best_of_2007_A_Christmas_Gift_For_You_from_Shankly

Shankly will be uploading end of year compilations between now and Christmas Eve, so check back regularly or risk missing out on the world&#039;s greatest music compiler compiling.
